name: User-meta-management
tagline: A WordPress plugin that allows you to view the meta keys associated with a given user.
body:
### User Meta Management
This handy plugin, with simple interface, allows you to manage the user meta information.

### Features
* Add, edit, or delete meta information of an individual user.
* Easily search for users who have same meta key and value combination.
* Omit meta information to be not shown by simply adding their keys to the excempted list.
* Default meta keys cannot be deleted by the user.

### Screenshots
Starting screen of the user meta management
![Front screen](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OsmosysSoftware/user-meta-manager/gh-pages/img/frontscreen.png)

Screenshot showing results of meta search.
![Meta search result](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OsmosysSoftware/user-meta-management/gh-pages/img/screenshotaddfilter.png)

Screenshot showing adding of meta keys to the user.
![Meta adding](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OsmosysSoftware/user-meta-manager/gh-pages/img/addusermeta.png)

Screen showing the deletion of meta keys.
![Preventing deletion](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OsmosysSoftware/user-meta-manager/gh-pages/img/preventdelete.png)

Screenshot showing adding of meta key to the selected users.
![Adding meta for selected users](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OsmosysSoftware/user-meta-management/gh-pages/img/screenslectusers.png)

Screenshot showing adding of meta key to the filtered users.
![Adding meta to the selected users.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OsmosysSoftware/user-meta-management/gh-pages/img/screenshotaddmetainfo.png)
